Class Current

  • java.lang.Object
    • ADO
      • Current
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Current
extends ADO
implements java.io.Serializable
    CS2212 6_TheWeather Current.java This class stores all information about the current weather. In addition to all variables from the super class, it stores the date and time it was created, as well as the time of sunrise and sunset of the day.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

       javax.swing.ImageIcon state)
        Constructor for the current weather object
        Parameters:
        now - the current time for the current weather object
        air - the air pressure for the current weather object
        wind - the wind speed for the current weather object
        temp - the current temperature for the current weather object
        min - the minimum temperature for the current weather object
        max - the maximum temperature for the current weather object
        humid - the humidity for the current weather object
        windDir - the wind direction for the current weather object
        sky - the sky condition for the current weather object
        rise - the projected sunrise time for the current weather object
        set - the projected sunset time for the current weather object
        state - the image that goes along with the associated sky condition
